    • Method Detail

      • getStateDocumentView

      • getResult

        StateIO getResult()

      • refresh

        void refresh()
        Refresh is at the moment needless. All changes are announced through the Observer-Pattern. This Method is used to refresh the Editor-Panel. For example can a JComboBox, that shows all Keys from the FlowObject, be updated. It can be that in a node, a object will be passed to the session. Through this method, the object can be shown in the combobox as well.

      • validate

        void validate()
              throws IllegalStateException
        If a Parameter is not defined, the editor has to throw an exception, that describes the error. So every status of an editor can be proofed.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException
